result.markdown:
::: {.question} **Convertible Note with Discount** ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} set.seed(404) #| eval: true #| echo: false #| results: asis #| warning: false note_value <- round(runif(1, 1.4, 1.6), 3) # Valor da nota discount <- 0.2 # Desconto de 20% series_price <- round(runif(1, 1.0, 2.0), 2) # Preço por ação na série conv_price <- round(series_price * (1 - discount), 3) # Preço com desconto new_shares <- round(note_value * 1000000 / conv_price, 3) ``` ::: **Context:** Yara invested in a startup using a convertible note of **$1.556 million**, with a **20% discount**. When the company raised Series A at **$1.55 per share**, her note converted at the discounted price. ::: {.question-block}
1. How many shares did Yara receive upon conversion?
✅ Shares = Note / Discounted Price = 1.556 million / 1.24 = **1.255 million shares**
::: :::
